contentrichtext.text: {{for|the borough|Farsta (borough)}} [[Image:Farsta torg.jpg|thumb|Square in Farsta.]] '''Farsta''' is a district in a borough with the same name in southern [[Stockholm]], see [[Farsta (borough)]]. It is also a metro station on the Green line (see [[Farsta metro station]]). The distance between central Stockholm and Farsta is 8 kilometers. ==Sports== The following sports clubs are located in Farsta: * [[FOC Farsta]] {{Coord|59|14|25|N|18|05|50|E|region:SE_type:city(45000)_source:dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts of Stockholm]] {{Stockholm-geo-stub}}
